quest.name: Hair Club for Hyur
journal: Helmhart of Highbridge could use an adventurer's assistance with a hair-raising problem.
Helmhart has a grievous physical ailment which requires immediate treatment. Slay phurbles around Highbridge to obtain three bottles of phurble blood, and deliver them to Helmhart with all speed.
You have successfully obtained the requisite bottles of phurble blood. Hasten back to Helmhart and deliver them before his condition deteriorates.
Helmhart concocts a potent hair tonic with the phurble blood you retrieved. Apply it liberally to his head, that his locks might flow forth once more.
Having applied the hair tonic to his shiny pate, Helmhart rejoices at the pleasant tingling sensation it affords. Whether it has any effect beyond this remains to be seen.
objectives: Slay phurbles to obtain their blood.
Deliver the bottles of phurble blood to Helmhart.
Apply the hair tonic to Helmhart's head.

dialogue.name: HELMHART
dialogue.text: You! Yes, you! Adventurer! I need you to fetch three bottles of phurble blood, and do so with all haste!

dialogue.name: HELMHART
dialogue.text: Where to find phurble blood, you ask? Why, from phurbles, of course! Now hurry! This is a matter of life and death!

dialogue.name: HELMHART
dialogue.text: Well? Have you brought the phurble blood I asked for? If so, then hand it over, and quickly now!

dialogue.name: HELMHART
dialogue.text: At long last! My friend, you're a godssend! Now, how did it go? Ah, yes─stir twice, a dash of spittle, shake thrice more, and...voilà!

dialogue.name: HELMHART
dialogue.text: Well, what are you waiting for, friend? Grab yourself a dollop and start spreading─my scalp cries out for succor! Oh, and do try not to miss a spot.

dialogue.name: HELMHART
dialogue.text: My, that tingles! Why, I can already feel my pores opening! In no time at all, I'll have flowing locks a fulm long!

dialogue.name: HELMHART
dialogue.text: I can't thank you enough, friend. What with the sun beating down the way it does in these parts, a bald pate is a potentially fatal affliction.
